title: Obed Wild & Scenic River: Calendar
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Calendar            Calendar           Keyword       By Date     Start Date      End Date          Search         Upcoming Events    Showing 3 results    Show ALL instances of recurring events   RSS Feed      Obed Wild & Scenic River Obed Preschool Story Time      Location: Obed Visitor Center Fees: FREE     Friday, August 19, 2016 Every Friday Weekly  from 01/08/2016 to 01/05/2018 Children are encouraged to bring their favorite book to be read by a ranger.  View Details      Obed Wild & Scenic River Fee Free Days at Obed      Location: Obed Wild and Scenic River     Thursday, August 25, 2016 Free Camping at Rock Creek Campground to be offered on the fee free days of 2015. View Details      Obed Wild & Scenic River Coffee and Climb With a Ranger      Time: 12:00 PM to 2:00 PM,10:00 AM Location: Lilly Bridge Climbing Area Fees: Free     Saturday, September 3, 2016 Every 1st Saturday of every month. from 01/02/2016 to 01/06/2018 Join rangers for a free cup of coffee at Lilly Bridge from 10 a.m. to 10:30 a.m. (ET). Then, beginning at Lilly Bridge at 11 a.m. (ET), NPS rangers will be leading the Climb with a Ranger program. View Details              A summer-time park visitor peers out over the Lilly Bluff Overlook.
